title: Design-Studio
description: A simple Figma-like design editor built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.Create shapes, add text & comments, manage layers, and export your design as JSON.

title: Responsive-UI-Clone
description: Built a fully responsive front-page UI of a website clone using HTML and SCSS. Focused on layout, styling, and cross-browser compatibility no interactive features implemented.

title: Modern-Landing-Page
description: Built a modern landing page with interactive hover effects and animated background using JavaScript; layout is structured with partial responsiveness.

title: Productivity-Dashboard
description: Built a feature rich web app including To Do list, Daily Planner, Pomodoro Timer, Motivational Quotes, Daily Goals, Weather updates, and Theme switching. Focused on interactive UI and user-friendly interface for enhanced productivity.

title: Ecommerce-Website-Clone
description: Designed a static single page e-commerce UI using HTML and SCSS, focusing on layout, styling, and visually appealing interface. No interactivity or multi page navigation implemented.
